name: Darlie All Shiny White Charcoal Clean
ingredients: Water, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Glycerin, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Flavor, PEG-12, Cellulose Gum, Tetrasodium Pyrophosphate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Carrageenan, Charcoal Powder (Natural Bamboo Charcoal)
custom_review_set: Darlie All Shiny White Charcoal Clean
sample_set_nculdes: 1 travel size All Shiny White Charcoal Clean 40g
description:
Contains natural bamboo charcoal molecules which absorb dirt and deep clean the mouth.
 
Combine with SWA whitening agent which delivers effective whitening result, bringing dual whitening benefits.

- Clinical proven effectively whiten your teeth in 14 days

- Speedy Whitening Agent (SWA) removes yellowish stains

- Contains natural bamboo charcoal molecules effectively absorb dirt and deeply clean your mouth

- Fluoride for healthy teeth
 
How to use: Do not swallow. Rinse and spit out after use. Brush your teeth at least twice a day.
where_to_buy: Watsons, NTUC FairPrice, Guardian, Giant, Sheng Siong, Prime and selected cosmetic stores
